title: Iconify Quarto Extension
About Me
text: Passionate 🌍 geotechnical engineer, 🧑‍🔬 researcher, and 🌱 eager Python/R learner with a decade of experience. My focus spans geotechnical site characterization, cohesive deposit consolidation, and data-driven insights.

title: About Me
text:
Highlights

0️⃣ Education 🎓

M.Sc in Civil Engineering (Geotechnical) from BUET, Dhaka, Bangladesh (CGPA: 3.33)
B.Sc in Civil Engineering from UAP, Dhaka, Bangladesh (CGPA: 2.75)
Ontario Academic Certificate (OAC) from Nelson A. Boylen Collegiate Institute, Toronto, Ontario (89%)
Cambridge O-Level from Emirates Private School, Al-Ain, United Arab Emirates



1️⃣ Master Thesis 📖

Evaluation of Consolidation Characteristics of Cohesive Soils From Piezocone Penetration Tests
Supervisor: Prof. Dr. Mehedi Ahmed Ansary..
Defense Board: Prof. Dr. Delwar Hossain, Prof. Dr. Abu Siddique, Dr. Jiban Kumar Sarker.



2️⃣ Research Interests 🔍

🏞| Geotechnical Site Characterization
💧 | Consolidation Behavior of Cohesive Deposits
📊| Geotechnical Data Analysis
🚧| Geotechnical Risk Assessment
🔄| Performance Evaluation of Ground Improvement Methods
⚠️| Construction Safety
📅| Project Management
🤖| Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling.



3️⃣ Work Experience 👷️
Led liquefaction analysis, developed polder models, and supervised upscale real estate projects with a commitment to safety and quality standards.


4️⃣ Technical Skills 🛠️
Proficient in R, Python, LaTeX, Markdown, MS Office, and simulation tools like PLAXIS 3D, ETABS, and AutoCAD.


5️⃣ Publications 📚
Contributed to the geotechnical knowledge through research on in situ and laboratory testing in the context of Bangladesh, soil liquefaction, construction safety, and dynamic responses of reinforced soil.


6️⃣ GitHub Repository 💻
Explore my coding endeavors and projects on GitHub.
Feel free to delve into my journey—a blend of engineering expertise, research intrigue, and a continuous pursuit of knowledge. For a detailed look at my background, check out my CV.

title: Salman Mazhar
text:
Hey there! I’m Salman Mazhar, a Geotechnical Engineer, Researcher, and currently on an exciting journey of learning Python/R. Join me in exploring the fascinating world of geotechnics through my projects and research. Let’s dive in and peel back the layers beneath the surface.


🚀 Embark on a journey through my story in geotechnical engineering:

🔍 | About Me: Get to know more about my background and interests.

🎓 | Education: Learn about my academic journey in civil engineering.

📖 | Master Thesis: Dive into my research on consolidation characteristics.

👷 | Work Experience: Explore my hands-on experiences in geotechnical engineering.

🛠️ | Technical Skills: Check out the tools and technologies I wield.

📚 | Publications: Discover my contributions to the world of geotechnics.

💻 | GitHub Repository: Explore my coding and project repositories.

Click on each to unveil a chapter of my professional odyssey!




💡 Latest Projects: Dive into the exciting projects in geotechnical engineering.
📚 Research Insights: Explore shared findings and insights in the field of geotechnics.
🌐 Connect with Me: Have questions or just want to chat? Find my contact details in the “About Me” section.

Feel free to navigate through the sections using the links above.
Thank you for dropping by! 🚀
